title: I'm really passionate about lore, so I made a video

embed.description: A new series I'm super passionate about, hope you guy enjoy, would love to do more if you guys like it.

body: There's alot to the lore in LoL, I aim to condense and make sense of it, along with theories and personal interpretations here or there.

replies.body:
This was a fun listen! Thanks for paying attention to some of the subtle clues hidden in Kindred. I would say, that there is a LOT of headcanon around how she/they exist in Runterra. I don't think they're non-existent, but I adore your theory that they're simply a myth or a story. We worked really hard to achieve that feel. 

Keep making more :)
Thanks! I was hoping I wasn't stretching too far on that theory, and it looks like I didn't. I absolutely love the lore in this game and you guys do a great job at writing it!
This is so nice. I'll be sure to sub :). Would love to see more in the future.

This is a really nice production.  You have a really good voice for this kind of thing, and the background music is a nice touch.  There's often a lot of stuttering and "uhs" in this kind of video, but you've clearly prepared.  I'm a fan of it.

My only complaint is the last three words in the title.  You don't need to do the clickbait title stuff.  Your content is really good and you're easing people in, and I think there's a definite audience for video content about League Lore.  Adding the Caps Lock and the multiple punctuation marks makes it look a little unprofessional, and this has a high enough quality that I think that's a detriment.

Keep up the good work.

This was an awesome listen, I really enjoyed it. I hope there are tons more to come! 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

Hey man, fellow lore nerd here, huuuuuuuuuuge lore fan, if you want to bounce ideas/how to phrase things or add little trivia tidbits, feel free to hit me up! If you have a discord that would be good. Just hoping to help you improve all this and make it a unique storytelling experience.
You sound like BrickyOrchid8, awesome video though! ^_^

That's awesome man! Very well done.
I'm super interested in the lores as well, but never took the time to read them all and piece everything together. I'll be looking forward to your future videos.
Thanks man! I've always been a lore guy, from Starcraft , Warcraft, to Dark souls, I love lore, especially when there's a lot to read into
does being passionate about lore make you post the same thread 2 times ?
I blanked on the the multiple sub rule thinking it would pertain to both sections, I believe this is a better place for it, I will be removing the other post
